text: Magali Noëlle Guiffray (27 June 1930 – 23 June 2015), better known as Magali Noël, was a French actress and singer. She was known for her song "Fais-moi mal, Johnny" ("Hurt me Johnny"). Her best known movie was La Dolce Vita. Noël died on 23 June 2015, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * * Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French singers
title: Magali Noël
